title: Such a beautiful ambience
desc: One of the nicest resorts I‚Äôve stayed at! The grounds are immaculate and the pool is soo relaxing! The breakfast buffet is amazing and the staff were super friendly and helpful. The rooms are beautifully decorated which adds to the overall experience.

title: Friendly staffs and good service
desc: Held my wedding there recently and it went really smooth thanks to our sales coordinator Jayden! He have been really helpful. Also a big shoutout to Anne and Giulio, they were very friendly and made the the whole stay better.

title: Sofitel Sentosa staycation
desc: Impressed with the service at our staycation and was happy with my decision to go ahead with choosing Sofitel Sentosa for our annual Christmas staycation. Specially impressed with the service from pool staff - Joshi Marcus Eidil and Dylan, my kids made a mess with the slushy ordered and they cleaned up the mess without a word of complaint and also served us another glass on the house. They ensured all our needs were attended to and made sure we were comfortable and happy throughout our stay. Different experience as what we have encountered from other 5 star hotel. Worth staying!

title: Relaxing & calming!
desc: A very pleasant & relaxation staycation experience! However my wife & I did experience a lot of mosquito bites at the garden area nearby our room at the Peace Wing. Nevertheless, the excellent staff at the pool, exceptionally Marcus, made our day with fantastic service, like bringing us a set of towels & drinks during our swim, without us having to request for these!

title: Great food with excellent service
desc: Love the service from Nataliya. She gave very good recommendations of food choices. Took the extra mile to speak to us and check in with us. Very good experience with The Cliff. Would definitely recommend anyone who would like to have dinner with nice ambience and excellent service.

title: Shiok Dinner
desc: If you are looking to an immersive dinner, The Cliff is the answer. You are able to indulge the delicious food in a beautiful atmosphere setting. The staffs are friendly and approachable too. They accommodate to your taste and recommends the best. Just amazing!

title: Great place
desc: Great place, really awesome service from Nataliya and Jay and the rest of the staff. The pizza and linguine were so good üëç The view is also really cool, general ambiance was fantastic ü´∂ Thank you for the great night!

title: Excellent
desc: I just finished eating dinner at The cliff with my dad and his friends. The service was excellent and the ambiance relaxed. The lamb we ordered was cooked medium and it was delicious. The pink sauce scallop pasta and meat lovers pizza both were good too. Unfortunately the risotto was not to my liking, it was more on the bland side. My dad didn‚Äôt like the clam linguine as he found it sandy, for which we were eventually told, that was due to some fish roe they used.

title: Service provided
desc: The buffet and poolside services provided during the stay was excellent. Everyone that has came up to offer help and amenities to ensure that we have an enjoyable experience at the resort has done their best, of those were Joshi, Marcus and Eidil. Thank you!

title: Wonderful anniversary dinner
desc: We celebrated our anniversary with dinner at The Cliff restaurant and had a pleasant experience with the care and attention from Emma and her team. They were very attentive and surprised us with a generous cake to celebrate our special occasion.

title: Good service and friendly place to hang out
desc: Staycation in this hotel for birthday celebration and pre-Christmas chillax time before marching into new year 2023. Lunch at The Cliff, without fail, they never failed me so many times I been lunching or dinner there. Staff are friendly and especially Mani whom bother to remember my previous order and even reminded me of my desert when I nearly walked out after a sumptuous and fulfilling lunch in such a nice weather. Thanks so much for the hard work and effort to keeping the environment friendly for patrons. Highly recommend all to come dine or drink at this restaurant. Oh special thanks to those behind the bars for also remembering my margarita and pina colada order every time I bypass them. üòÄüòÄ Have a wonderful Merry Christmas and a prosperous happy new year 2023!

title: Great meal at The Cliff
desc: Brought my family and domestic helper there for an appreciation meal to my helper who was due to return to her home country for good. Mani, Charis and Angela (the staff who took care of us at The Cliff) - they were welcoming and took good care of us. Very attentive and made us feel welcomed. We enjoyed the lunch and took lotsa nice pictures. We will be planning to return for another meal soon. Send our warmest regards to them. K and family

title: Great Experience
desc: Our very first trip to Singapore and stayed here for 4 days.Rooms were very clean,Had all the facilities like pool,Gym etc.Service was great .All the staff members esp their Manager Anne and staff member Hafidz went out of the way to ensure we had a memorable trip.Highly recommended

title: Great Experience!
desc: Amazing poolside and accommodating staff especially Joshi, Marcus, and Eidil! Loved the service, tranquillity and the ambiance. Room was as pictured, check in was smooth and staff were all helpful. Would book again!

title: Relaxing Stay At Sofitel Sentosa
desc: Warm and attentive service provided by staff especially Giulio at the reception.Best enjoyed the relaxed swimming under the palm trees and the resort being close to the relatively quieter tanjong beach is a bonus for us; To do a leisure walk after an hearty meal and take in the sea views! Will visit again definitely.

title: Massage
desc: Fantastic massage by Rodel. His training in physical therapy and over a decade of experience in the massage line with Spa Botanica which later became So Spa really shone through the fantastic massage he gave to me. My shoulder muscles are now loose and limber and my skin feels fantastic from the oil treatment of lavender and sage. Would come back! Great sauna facility and hot + cold pools too.

title: Memorable stay at Sofitel
desc: Our family of four arrived in beautiful Singapore a few days ago and enjoyed the luxury and privilege of staying at Sofitel Hotel on Sentosa island. Service, facilities, views, beds, pool area were all fantastic! Some stand out people included Jack, Isabelle and Alan from concierge who were knowledgeable and helpful in providing great recommendations for restaurants, massages, shopping and ideas for our teens. Anne, Giulio & Serene from reception were very welcoming and went above and beyond in making our stay comfortable with all the little extras thrown in. Joshi from the poolside area was welcoming, friendly and professional always greeting us with an open smile day and night....Marcus the pool side manager and Guy from The Cliff restaurant were funny, warm and

title: One of my favourite hotels in Singapore!
desc: Great experience at one of the nicest hotels in Singapore. It started with the quick and seamless check in experience. Front desk staff was courteous and helpful with my requests. Room was tip top. Clean, functional, everything worked well. Wifi was a little weak but it was still possible to stream Netflix and full HD as well as work calls so no complaints there. The margherita from Le Bar was shaken and very well prepared. A worthy welcome drink indeed! Dining at the Cliff, I want to commend the following staff, Charis, Putera and Glen for making my evening a truly enjoyable one. The recommended food and wine choices were very tasty. However, I did find the lamb portion a little small. It was done to a perfect medium while the veal was a nice medium rare. Yum! Breakfast

title: Christmas eve dining at The Cliff Sofitel Sentosa
desc: I am very happy with Ms.Wai Wai‚Äôs kindness and customer care. She showed that she cares from her heart. I was on a solo dining at sofitel on 23/12/22. I was attended by Ms.Wai Wai, she not only told me the direction to the cliff, instead she walked me all the way there and ensured I was seated before she left me to enjoy my dining. I was afraid that it will be awkward as I was alone but she made sure I felt welcomed. At the cliff, I was attended by Mr.Putera who was very patient with explaining on the menu and food items. He was well versed with the menu even without looking at the physical menu, I was amazed at how he presented suggestions for Hot food items with such a welcoming tone of voice. Overall for a first solo dining experience I had a great one here in The cloff

title: A hidden gem which outperforms the biggest hotels in Singapore (yes, also THAT one...)
desc: A hidden gem. We arrived on Singapore booking only the first 4 nights and the last two with a gap of 4 days. After booking top hotels which turned out to be quote a disappointment (Park Royal Pickering , where they asked us to make our daughter pay for the breakfast, even though it was included in the booking and Shangri-la Rasa, with an outstanding service but VERY old premises which are in desperate need of modernization...), I decided to go for this one. We booked it for two nights but the same day of arrival i decided to extend our stay. Well kept, modern +no carpets in the hallways and I'm the rooms, thank God!) but with respect to tradition. You are in a welcoming oriental environment where you can also have access to western food. A beautiful mix with a caring service.

title: Kweezeen restaurant -Farah is awesome
desc: Farah has been the most pleasant and been taking care of us the whole meal at the kweezeen restaurant. It was great to have my needs taken care of. Been here for a Christmas lunch and it was nice to know that all my needs were attended to.

title: Excellent service!
desc: We had a lovely time having cocktails by the pool. Joshi, Marcus, Eidil and Daylan were wonderful. We had some great cocktails, a Singapore sling and a bay breeze. Highly recommend. The team were lovely and attentive.

title: Dinner
desc: Our first time visit to the restaurant greeted by friend staff . Good recommendations of food and respond of our request fast and efficient . We felt comfortable and would be back again . Was served by Jia Hui and Alson . Thank you for their service .

title: Staycation
desc: It is my third time staying in sofitel sentosa and the service never drops! There is always something new that was in place every time i come back. There is a recreation activity near the poo, the table tennis table, the foosball and others was all prepared. Life jackets was provided as well. Room was magnificent. Service rendered by Asst Chief Concierge Jack, and his team consist of Hafiz and Rahman is great. Anne; Asst Guest Relations Manager was very welcoming. Claire and Serene whom are their part timers receptionist handled our check in process seamlessly. This time I had the opportunity to dine in at Cliff Restaurant for Lunch and enjoy LeBar to catch the world cup finals. The vibe was amazing. Shoutout to Marcus from The Cliff who spend time having conversations with us

title: Fantastic anniversary dinner at The Cliff Restaurant
desc: We had an amazing night - definitely made better by the great food and service provided by the lovely team at the cliff. Special thanks to Angela and Mr Guna who were spot on with their menu recommendations and even checking in time from time to make sure we are having a great time!

title: Thanks for the great dinner
desc: It was great family dinner! Especially the staff Mani is very kids-friendly and kind!! A variety of Excellent food and a very good view from the outdoor seats. We gurantee that we will come back as soon as possible!!!üòÉüòÉ

title: Birthday Celebration
desc: Me and My girlfriend are celebrating her birthday. The staff Natalia & Mami are so friendly and helpful. The food is great and tender. As we requested, they prepare the birthday cake and wished her. We recommend.

title: A Jolly Affair at Sofitel Sentosa
desc: We had a delightful Xmas Brunch at Kwee Zeen. The food selection was insane and could easily be one of best i‚Äôve had this year. Ms Farah was amazing and kept checking in to make sure we were well taken care of. Ms Elsa and Ms Maurice were all smiles and brought the festive cheer with them when they welcomed us and helped us out with the free flow drinks. Some of the staff in green needs more training as their speech comes off quite brusque. Overall an amazing brunch and I would highly recommend it.

title: Best Christmas High Tea!
desc: Sofitel Sentosa has a great selection of pastries, relaxing ambiance and wonderful customer service! Ms Mildra‚Äôs amazing and attentive. Highly recommend and will definitely come back with friends and family.

title: A Wonderful Christmas Time
desc: Stayed here for one night and it was a memorable experience for my friends and I. Checking in was smooth and we were greeted warmly by the staff. Getting to the villa was smooth with the aid of the van for all our food and drinks for our little Christmas celebration. The room was clean and picturesque. We had a little issue with the TV (we wanted to connect our karaoke dongle) but the engineering team were prompt with assistance and did their best to help us, thank you very much for going the extra mile! We had a stroll around the premises to look around and were warmly greeted everywhere, and a duty manager gave us glowsticks to light our way ‚Äì a cute experience! Sleep was restful with the comfortable beds. Breakfast was a delight with the delicious food and attention from the

title: NYE staycation
desc: We had our NYE weekend here, and NYE dinner at the Cliff restaurant. Considering it was the year end peak period, post Covid travel was ramping up and the fact that the hotel is pet friendly, I was mentally prepared to accept some lapses in service and cleanliness. Was pleasantly surprised when they met -and exceeded- all expectations! Our room at Tranquility wing was spotless, and a good size. Hot water comes on easily and bathtub fills quickly. They also provided an air purifier in the room. Toiletries provided were made with eco friendly material and in recyclable packaging, which I appreciated. The breakfast spread was extensive and the standard of fare was excellent. Staff were attentive without being obtrusive. Dinner at the Cliff was great, we were served by Natalia who

title: Great excellent service
desc: I have been there for one night during Covid but service is a six star rating now. We had a slight late check in due to full occupancy. However the staff gave us a complimentary drink fro the bar. we had a booking at the cafe for Christmas lunch but because it was too busy, our high tea came late, To our sunrise, the mixologist surprise us with a cocktail to start the day. And she spend sone tine doing PR with usThe atmosphere was so real that you felt that you were in Bali, Then time to check in to our room. To our surprise we were upgraded two levels up from the basic room. It was just so nice for a change to have a separate living room and bedroom. The fixtures in the room were all super cool and we were welcome with chocolates and fruit baskets. Services for ad hoc items we

title: Best choice for a year-end getaway
desc: I spent the night at the Villa du Jardin for an exclusive Christmas getaway with my friends, and we all had a fantastic time. I loved the private pool, the welcome touches, and the huge, cozy bedrooms. I highly recommend this villa if anyone is looking to enjoy a resort stay in Singapore. I also need to mention that the team there was quick to respond to any of our requests. If there were anything that required improvement, it would have been great if the villa had a more updated TV model ^^

title: Magical Christmas Celebration at the Imperial Suite with family and friends enjoying every moment.
desc: It takes an entire hotel to make magic having hosted our nearest and dearest at the Imperial Suite for a Christmas party! Seamless check-in: The different teams have banded together to make our stay a truly memorable and magical experience - from front desk (Justin Phua, Vincent Tang, Azlina), the team has outdone itself by being so patient with our various requests and always being so responsive to our queries. Wonderful F&B experience Next up, the room service & F&B teams have worked so hard to attend to our dining and logistical needs as we had a large group of over 20 guests at the Christmas party. The team never fails to delight us wherever we went from dining at the Cliff (Peter Yeong, Mani) / Kwee Zeen / Le Bar (Anthony, Meimei) to the in-room dining team for helping

title: Countdown 2023, Happy New Year!
desc: We stayed and celebrated our Countdown 2023 from 29 Dec 2022 to 3 January. Sofitel Resort Sentosa and Spa is always one of our best resort for the past 31 years. We admire the beautiful and relax environment. Especially in front of the swimming pool was wonderful. And enjoyed The Cliff ambience, food and wine, especially looking at the beautiful sunset! The service and values of Sofitel management and team ambassadors was excellent. Although this period, the resort occupancy was high, however, the year-end spirits built by the team was amazing. With Justin‚Äôs assistance, he arranged a Junior Suite for us. The room is nice and clean. I liked watching TV program at the living room so will not disturb my wife resting. Also we enjoyed a classic Bentley/Rolls Royce car ride to/fro

title: Poolside Sofitel Sentosa
desc: Great to be at Sofitel for the festive season! Best service at the pool side, Thanks to the team and special thanks to Joshi, Marcus, eidil and Daylan. Really enjoying the stay and the warm welcoming of the hotelüôèüèΩ

title: Exceptional service and service and experience with amazing people
desc: Exceptional service and experience with amazing people, We would like to thank Justin Phua for his outstanding professional service whilst we were staying at Sentosa Sofitel. He and his team made us feel so welcomed with great smile and happy spirit. We have been to many hotels before around the world, and I must say this is the best experience we have ever received. Keep up the the amazing work Justin Phua, you are an incredible individual that more hotels should have. Regards Eric and the family

title: Tranquil setting
desc: The office staff at this hotel were excellent, in particular Giulio, who was so helpful when we checked in. Special mention to bar staff, Emma, Justin and Jay. This resort hotel is very nice. The rooms we had could do with some updating, particularly the bathrooms as you had to step into the bath for a shower. The New Year‚Äôs Eve dinner at the Cliff was outstanding.

title: Trip after COVID
desc: First time to stay in resort theme hotel in Singapore, Highly recommended. From check in till check out, we experienced all friendly and helpful staff. Rooms very clean, comfy and spacious, housekeeping staff are alway friendly and helpful. Food wise, the Laksa was delicious and has a nice presentation, you must try it out at KweeZeen. My family definitely enjoy it and will be return in the near future, as my kids been asking for it.

title: Wonderful hotel!! Will be back
desc: Let me start by saying that this. This was the most exquisite and luxurious vacation ever. From the moment we walk in and the moment we walk out it was all amazing. Honestly like everything it does is just perfect to the dot. When we ever leave we will ask the housekeeping to clean up our rooms and when we come back into our rooms it looked like nobody was ever in it. It was boarder-line shining. I also want to mention the bed. Especially the pillow. The pillow was the perfect thing for me as I usually have a hard time sleeping because of my neck. But the pillow in Sofitel was truly just wonderful, not too hard but also not too soft made it a joyful sleep every night I was out in less than 10 minutes. The bed sheets, duvet and mattress were out of this world too! For the 4

title: Birthday Dinner
desc: Great Experience and service. Enjoyed the sunset view with Loved one. The veal texture is really tender. I love the dessert as well. Thank you very much Nataliya and Mani for excellent hospitality. Enjoyed the food ü•∞ and Complimentary Birthday cake üéÇü•∞

title: Honeymoon trip
desc: I enjoyed everything here, it is clean, hygienic and beautiful place to relax . Especially the pool section, Josie and Macus they are very good and friendly. I strongly recommend this place. Hopefully u guy have a good experience like what we do in here

title: Perfect 18th birthday
desc: Perfect stay with perfect service. Great accomodation from the front office helping decorate the room for my son's 18th birthday ! Special shout out to Serene and yixuan whom assisted with the check in ( front desk ) Anne ( Guest Relations ) who helped make my son feel special with all the decos Justin ( Front office manager) who accommodated us and our requests And also to the bar and room service team whom have gone above and beyond in making my son feel jubilant and joyful during this joyous occasion. Gana who spoiled my son with all the room service orders and complimentary birthday cake ! Meimi Ian the bartender Anthony the bar manager who helped my son with his first drink after reaching 18 years old . Truly enjoyed our stay here and will be back here for sure.

title: Give it a miss
desc: Poor service. Run down facilities. Overpriced. Rooms are old and cluttered with furniture. Bathrooms are dated and mold everywhere. Had to constantly ask for toilet paper and soap. Phones in room did not work. Poor serice at breakfast and most staff did not understand english very well. Worst coffee Ive ever tasted. Gym is a make shift cabana in the middle of the gardens. For the money we paid.... nearly $1400 per night, the worst hotel ive ever stayed at. By coincidence, spoke to person at taxi rank at the Gardens by the Bay, who said they checked out at day 2 of a 10 day their stay at this hotel, for the exact same reasons. We should have done the same.

title: Staycation at sofitel sentosa
desc: A wonderful relaxing stay. A special thanks to Justin who welcome us with warm smiles and cater to our every needs. A pleasant way to start the year! Do try out their fish feeding foot spa and explore the way to the palawan beach for a sunny day

title: First time staying
desc: My very first time stay in a resort theme hotel in Singapore. If you never been, you must try! When you arrival to lobby, you can notice full of beautiful Chinese New Year Decoration, looks very elegant. We staying for two nights and all the time we spending in the resort it never feel boring. Rooms very nice and clean, when we arrival on the first day, we receive a towel art with hand writing card on bed from housekeeping supervisor Eric, he is the one prepared out room. We also met Vivian at the corridor on the next day and she also from Housekeeping department. For the breakfast, I would suggest to sit at outdoor, so you can enjoy a very nice breeze and some peacock walking around. Swimming pool also is one of the spot we won‚Äôt skipped daily. We will definitely

title: Vacation
desc: Service buy the pool side absolutely amazing buy Joshi and the Marcus and the team A absolutely amazing time and excellent service. I had I incredible time and I would suggest that everyone staying at the Sofitel to come and enjoy the relaxing pool side experience with this amazing team of people.

title: Excellent pool service and great relaxation
desc: We‚Äôve been staycation for 3 nights during the new year eve. Lovely resort with good vibe. Specially praise the pool service team with Marcus, an excellent 5 star friendly service, that absolutely enhanced the whole holiday season.

title: Exceptional Food & Service
desc: Celebrated our anniversary here and it‚Äôs was perfect. Exceptional ambience, food and service. We had an exceptional experience thanks to Nataliya Mani. Her service was top notch and she knows the menu so well and we love all her recommendations.

title: Good service, good food.
desc: Our waiters: Charis and Putrea ensured that we were satisfied with our food. The food was amazing- the beef and lamb was tender, the potatoes were crispy and the fish was very flavourful. Also, they had a wide range of food items in the menu to select from.

title: 2023 holiday
desc: Sofitel Sentosa is amazing. The room is nice. The reception and everyone are so nice and friendly. The facilities are fabulous especially the pool. Joshi and Marcus are the best at the swimming pool side.

title: Great but pretty expensive for a tourist from the Philippines
desc: GREAT HOTEL!! It was a very relaxing stay, one of the quickest elevators ever btw. Though it is a bit far from the beach. There are three pools, two in the spa and one in the hotel. Great hotel but only good for a night or two for a "rest day".

title: Pet-friendly Kwee Zeen restaurant is a great place to dine and chill with your dog
desc: Visited Kwee Zeen restaurant at Sofitel for the Bossipaws event with my dog and we had a great time. The staff at Kwee Zeen are very friendly towards my dog and the alfresco dining area is facing the swimming pool which is well-sheltered, spacious and has a nice relaxing resort vibes. The food served was delicious and portion was generous. My dog and I also enjoyed strolling around the pool area and the beautiful arrival lobby of Sofitel. We appreciate it so much that Sofitel is truly a very pet-friendly hotel. Will definitely come back again!

title: Pet friendly cafe
desc: Had lunch here for bossipaws event. A pet friendly cafe with Great Food & Service. Very clean environment with spacious place. Sofitel also provides staycation with our furry pets . Have yet to try staying but will try having a staycation with my furry kids. Overall had a great experience . Will visit again :)

title: Satisfying lunch on a kickback Sunday
desc: Had lunch at Le Bar, and the food and drinks were great! Had the chicken rice, club sandwich, margarita and lemon tea; all very delicious. Very nice ambience, with excellent service from Aron, Mei and Jackson! Highly recommend for a chillax weekend lunch.

title: One day trip with my daughter from Tokyo
desc: I visited here with my daughter on 25th Mar for only one day stay. Staff in Sofitel are all kind to us. The lady staff took a photo during enjoying biting be fish in the pool. And door guy are also friendly. When check out on 26 Mar, front desk lady explained how to go to beach. I enjoyed beach. When we came back to the hotel, Marcus,Dylan, Jack provided very nice service and talked casually to us. My daughter came from Japan and good memories for her. I felt very comfortable here staying even one day. Thank you!!

title: Great location
desc: Spent half a day at the poolside with Marcus, Jack and Dylan. Great service, very attentive. Great location my poolside, surety relaxed and would definitely recommend this place even if you are not staying at the hotel.

title: Morning smile!
desc: In Kween Zen restaurant, I had breakfast. Beyond delicious cuisine, Czarlyn made my day more enjoyable. She is very accommodating and passionate about what she does. She keeps a cheerful outlook on her work, which is important to have while starting the day.

title: Great experience with Sofitel Sentosa on March 2023
desc: The experience with Sofitel Sentosa was great. We had our wedding ceremony and two nights stay here with our families. The arrangement of the event is excellent, and the services are top notch. Everything is well organized and staff here are always fast responsive and responsible. We had our buffet breakfast the next day after wedding. And the food is nice too. Overall, this was an almost perfect journey with Sofitel. If anything I can think of as an improvement to be done, probably the room is a bit humid.

title: Unforgettable wedding experience in Sofitel Sentosa
desc: Great experience having wedding in Sofitel! Staffs are all very nice and helpful. Solemnisation place and ballroom are just perfect for an elegant, decent and sweet wedding. Hotel room is abit humid with some mouldy smell but it is understandable as hard to be avoided in Sentosa sea area. Overall memorable experience and I would definitely recommend my friend again.

title: Legendary bar staff, soft beds and beautiful scenery
desc: The rooms were spacious, had super soft beds and good facilities. The foyer is a work of art visually. Overal the resort was wonderful, the staff were amazing and the food was delicious. The pool area was beautiful and the pool temp was perfect!! Absolute shout out to the amazing bar staff Aron, Evan and Sheril who went above and beyond to assist with our requirements and made our stay very memorable! Special mention to Aron, what a legend!

title: Phenomenal massage and salt scrub at the Sofitel Sentosa Spa
desc: I was treated by Sunita and this was the best massage I have ever had in my life. She was so kind, friendly and ensured that I felt comfortable and relaxed. Her massage technique was thorough and firm, yet gentle at the same time. Thank you for everything. ‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: Dining with my furkid at kweezeen restaurant
desc: Food at kweezeen is üíØ Had the seafood fried rice and it‚Äôs rly good. Ambience is nice & great to bring your fur kids. It‚Äôs spacious enough between seats so that your furkid does not feel overwhelmed by others. Overall hotel had lots of greenery, feels super relaxing + a great getaway with your furry ones!

title: Excellent
desc: The stay in the hotel experience was excellent. Start from step into the lobby. The staff was very helpful to collect all our 8 luggage. Room service very fast response to bring the things we want extra for us without question us. The morning breakfast was normal but the staff was very helpful to assist and serve us especially 1 of the staff call Princess. Overall... it was a great pleasure stay in sofitel sentosa.

title: Lovely vacation
desc: Great place .. stayed in the family suite with two kids and it was sufficient .. amazing pool and excellent service .. best part is the stairway at the back that takes you down straight to the beach road .. it‚Äôs a long way up but good exercise !

title: Dog friendly
desc: Went to attend a dog gathering at their Kwee Zeen restaurant. Staff are very attentive and friendly to the dogs! We has a wonderly lunch there. Would definitely look forward to do a staycation there with our furkids.

title: Happy Travel
desc: The customer service at this property is excellent. They were accommodating and responsive to my questions. Shout out to front desk - Wei Wei for her immaculate service above self attitude. Thanks for the hospitality and care, she went the extra mile without even asking , reception team and concierge - Ziyao, Ram were friendly and helpful. Loving their Fish Spa and the Bali vibes, feels like you are somewhere on a tropical island and out of Singapore. Will return for sure ! ;)

title: We were served by Marcus,Dylan and Joetta,Justin very helpful and exceptional service-minded people at the reception des
desc: The staff is exceptional! We were served by Marcus,Dylan and Joetta,Justin very helpful and exceptional service-minded people at the reception desk and concierge. We‚Äôd love to come back to your beautiful hotel ü§©üíÉüèΩüòé

title: Good visit but traumatic!
desc: 3rd visit to the resort and overall property is well maintained. Food was nice and the resort has a direct access to the Tanjong Beach through a hidden downward staircase. Booked a family room of two interconnected Deluxe rooms. A bit sad with the amenities through since the setup is not completed with a range of coffee capsule (now only 2) and no snacks in minibar. The towel hook is broken in one of the bathroom and there no other areas to hook your toilets in the toilet. Overall, its fine, for family staycation. Another point i would like make. Upon check-in, i was presented with a scene of intense commotion at the check in desk. The lady who served me, ends up crying and being told to go to the back office. As much as she might not be experienced in swapping rooms or

title: Great food & place
desc: Visited Kwee Zeen Restaurant at Sofitel Sentosa today. The food was great, staff are friendly and helpful. Great place to bring your furkids to dine in during staycation. Definitely will bring my two dogs back again

title: Sofitel Sentosa
desc: The Manager Justin was really helpful and patient in helping to sort out certain administrative issues. The resort was a nice break from city life in Singapore. The Fish Spa was quite fun and a novel attraction.

title: Well served by Melody at Kwee Zeen
desc: We dined at Kwee Zeen. We were served by a part timer named Melody. She is excellent, polite and helpful. Her attention to details is beyond our expectation. After serving the food, she came back to our table continually to inquire if the food served was ok, besides asking what she can help further or anything else we need. My husband and I were delighted with the dining experience that day.

title: Pet friendly restaurant - Kweezeen!
desc: Brought my Bichonpoo for a dog gathering at Kwee-zeen. Had a pleasant experience right from the drop off area - staff offered to help with the dog pram and guided us to Kwee-zeen promptly. Food portion was generous and the outdoor dining area was very spacious (20-30kg dogs could have ample space to rest). would definitely return if we required a more fancy venue for gatherings! Some seats in the middle aisle were warm due to the direction of fans placed. It would also be a nice gesture if dogs were offered water, and food menu to be expanded to include the variety offered (not sure if menu was limited due to this being an event) All in all - a great experience!

title: Pet event with Bossipaw

title: AWESOME! This hotel is terrific!
desc: I booked this hotel through my Agent for my business group, and it's really met my expectations; all my guests are very satisfied and have no complaints at all. The room is very comfortable, the bed is neat, and the food is the best! Special thanks to Ms. Giovanni Viterale, Ms. Juliana Yeo, Ms. Rhea, and the Moroccan Chef (my apologies, I forgot his name); they were really nice, helpful, and professional, with good hospitality. In addition, the concierge staff was very helpful and friendly, including bringing me a cup of coffee in the lobby while I was so busy at that time. But there is only one staff member who needs to improve her hospitality at the reception. Overall, this place is nice. And surely! I really recommend this hotel and will return to it soon.

title: Anniversary stay at Sofitel Sentosa Hotel
desc: I stayed 2 nights at Sofitel Sentosa hotel with my husband for our anniversary stay. The check in was fast and we managed to get our room before 3pm. The room was great and clean also. The room service was good and responsive. We had our meals at the hotel restaurants- we really enjoyed both night dinners at The Cliff, particularly the second night when we were served by Mr Jay, who had great recommendations for us. We also enjoyed our welcome drinks at Le Bar, thanks to Reception manager Ms Emma for assisting. Last but definitely not least, our stay was made particularly special and memorable with the special anniversary cake and champagne arranged by hotel manager Ms Ann, who also took the extra effort to arrange for late checkout for us. Overall it was a wonderful stay and we

title: A memorable stay
desc: I booked a room for my gal's 18th birthday. From check-in till the day of checking out, the service rendered to us have been excellent. When we first arrived, our family feels the good energy and motivation from the staff. From the concierge, restaurant staff to housekeeping they were as awesome. In gist, my family, including my fury pet, felt at home. Everything was spot on. 1. Mathew Leesbourn, impeccable service. A role model of Sofitel' service. 2. One of their F&B staff named, Farah. She was attentive and calm in taking our order despite the morning peak hour. Service was still prompt and this did impressed upon my family. 3. Their housekeeping, Zhang Wei, was very friendly and accommodating when he was cleaning up our room. Congratulation to Sofitel on having a group

title: A dream holiday
desc: A superb vacation which went beyond my expectations. The staff, especially jack, Marcus, Sebastian and Dylan were attentive, helpful and always made me feel welcome with a hello can I help. The pool is fabulous, warm, entertaining and beautiful to spend a whole day by. The hotel itself is stunning. Everywhere you look there is beauty. You are in paradise. The restaurants the cliff and the kwee have superb menus and the food is cooked to perfection. It‚Äôs easy to come and go with the Sofitel shuttle and free buses around the island. I hope to visit again very soon.

title: Fantastic experience at So Spa
desc: Got so pampered at So Spa ! Yuni greeted me with the warmest smile, guided me to the nice massage room. The ambience was so relaxing, I could feel my muscles all relaxed even before the 90min massage started! She let me tried the three different essential oil and explained to me how the oil will benefit me. The massage bed is one of the best I ever lied on . Yuni ‚Äòs magical touch totally got all my tired points and solved my tired muscles issues ! Definitely recommend So Spa to everyone who arrives on Sofitel or even Sentosa ! I am so hooked on such luxurious treatment.

title: Good people with service, overwhelmed with facilities needing change
desc: Great experience at So Spa - Mr Rodel and Ms Sai are professional and friendly in their interactions. Sofitel Sentosa - Ms Ezzy, Jack, Omar and team working hard and doing their Brest with the many guests. Facilities much room to improve : 1. Room had TV plug off and needed technician to come fix 2. when turned on, showed name of wrong guest 3. Sofa in room is old and worn - no support and sat on the wooden frame 4. Calls to One touch long time to answer

title: Amazing Pool Service!!!
desc: Amazing service from Marcus from the pool team, Dylan. Checking in from the water temperature of the pool to food services, ensuring that we get the best experiences as a customer and extending the same experience to all customers.

title: Wonderful Experience at The Cliff!
desc: We had dinner at The Cliff for the first time. After a day at work, we were looking forward to a great evening. The staff in Sofitel were great! We had a great dinner prepared by Chef Paolo who spent time to explain his dishes, I love the beef tartare, braised beef cheek just melted in my mouth and the tiramisu is a must have! The service staff including Adrian, Mani and Rey were very friendly, especially Adrian who was very attentive and made us feel very at home. The Head Chef, Chef Ken Chaw also came to each table in the restaurant to chat and ensure that us and the other guests in the restaurant were well taken care of. Truly 5 star!

title: Amazing food and service at cliff
desc: Nataliya from the cliff was great. Great staycation and lunch. Beef was great. Soup was delicious. Dessert recommendation was spot on. Lemon target was brilliant. Sweet and sour, amazing lunch on our last day

title: Perfect!
desc: Celebrated our anniversary at Sofitel Sentosa and was pleasantly introduced to the hotel by the concierge staff. Very attentive and detailed explanation of the facilities upon getting our room keys. After checking into our room, was looking to fix our growling tummies and was served pleasantly by Marcus. Kudos to him as he got us seated facing their beautiful pool and ordered lovely cuisines from their Kwee Zen kitchen, while making sure we got the best experience possible! Thank you.

title: Escape the City
desc: Great Amenities and View. A great escape from the city life here in Singapore. The staff are all very accommodating and alert. The breakfast buffet is great as well. A lot of choices ranging from Normal American Breakfast, Indian and European foods. Marcus Ryan even gave us some tips and showed us great views of the sunset.

title: Excellent service and stay
desc: Check in was really smooth, even had a walk through of the hotel's amenities. Had a chance to try their pool; it was really a good experience. The pool has heated water, so it was a very comfortable swim. Overall the service is excellent, but a special shoutout to Marcus and Ryan for their warm welcome and excellent service. Definitely will be back here if there is another opportunity. Thank you for the excellent stay.

title: Very relaxing
desc: Marcus, pool team, Eidil Singapore sling made by Dylan was very nice and the pool was very refreshing after the heat. Good facilities and plenty of equipment to play with by the pool which added to the experience.

title: Good experience!
desc: Had my birthday dinner at The Cliff. The atmosphere is great and romantic. Come at around 630pm and you can catch the sunset too. Food is slightly above average. The service crew are great and friendly - esp Nataliya and a middle age man (sounds like hongkee).

title: First time in Sofitel!
desc: It was my first time visiting Sentosa Sofitel. It impressed me a lot with comfy environment and friendly staffs. All the staffs show their passion in work, not forget to mention one of the interesting person that I met, Marcus. He was good at taking pictures! Also, he printed our pictures and gave us as gift to record our memorable moment in Sofitel. Also, this place is so near to the beaches! All in all, Sofitel is a good choice of having a rest and I would wish to visit this place again!

title: Responsive lifeguard always on the watch
desc: The lifeguard on duty was attentive and responsive. On 1st June, around 7pm plus, he saved a kid from drowning in the pool and prevented a catastrophic incident from happening. Kudos to the lifeguard

title: Another most excellent adventure!
desc: We had a wedding here in 2018 and wanted to see how it had changed since Covid‚Ä¶we‚Äôre pleasantly surprised‚Ä¶ It‚Äôs still an amazing place. The waiter, Kai was excellent, and we strongly recommend you keep him long as you can. He is an asset to your company and should be promoted whenever possible‚Ä¶ You will not regret it!

title: Great meal in The Cliff
desc: Had an amazing dinner at the The Cliff at Sofitel Sentosa. The dinner was exquisite but most importantly the service by Adrian, Chef Paolo and Chef Ken truly reflects an amazing dining experience. Will definately come for more.

title: Nice food and Excellent Service!
desc: Nice food and excellent service by Chef Paolo, Adrian and Mani‚Ä¶. Love the Wagyu Beef and the pasta dishes, the wine is good to go with all the dishes, Adrian always checked on our table with smile. The atmosphere is great and will definitely visit again.

title: Marvellous experience
desc: One of the best stay. What a wonderful place full with wonderful people. Will see you again soon. Been there for a week with my wife and 2 kids. We enjoyed every bits of it. Place was amazing, food was excellent and service can not found fault. We will definitely be back.

title: The CLIFF of Excellence
desc: Had my dinner at The Cliff Restaurant, was served by a wonderful staff, Nataliya. Love the service, food & atmosphere was excellent! Will definitely come back again for more. Thank you, Nataliya!!! :-)

title: quite enjoyable overall.
desc: The resort is wonderfully situated, offering both convenience and an escape from the hustle and bustle. For business traveler like myself, its proximity to key commercial areas and meeting venues was a significant advantage.

title: Great Job Justin! :)
desc: Justin from the Call Centre/Room Reservations was amazingly helpful! He even remembered what I had requested for and called me back 2 days later to advise further. The attention to detail from Justin, 5 stars right there. Keep up the great work Justin, can't wait for my stay on the 5th of August because of this good start from him!

title: Excellent
desc: Nice hotel clean ,very friendly staff. The pool was great and clean. The views were fantastic. There was a convenient free bus stop very close to the hotel that allowed us to see lots of the island without stress.

title: Best place in Singapore for solemnisation
desc: Yesterday was a fabulous evening when we had our solemnisation and wedding dinner in Sofitel Sentosa. Saffron garden is the number 1 solemnisation venue in Singapore if you would like to enjoy both an enchanting garden and a fantastic sea view as background. We are really lucky to have Jayden and Farzea from the Sofitel‚Äôs team supporting us coordinating the theme setup as well as the western dining. The food is also very delightful, our family and friends are truly impressed! We will come back for a staycation some time in future. üòÑ

title: Hidden gem
desc: The place is really good. It makes you feel like you are far far away from city, while you are still about 10 mins drive. The resort room was perfect for couple, everything nice and clean, perfect aircon which is essential to hide from humid and warm weather. Kwee Zeen restaurant has variety of food for everyone, everything delicious, even for a picky person as myself. Breakfast buffets, Seafood buffets on Friday and Saturdays! Staff is very polite and always ready to help! Special thank you to Farah who looked after us during the stay

title: Hospitable
desc: Front office staff did an exceptional job to welcome us even thoe we were early they managed to give us early check in, they took good care of us Good job. look forward to come here again. Rooms were good as well

title: Good Resort - avoid the last building
desc: Spent a day with family in the hotel. Paid $45 to upgrade to a suite room. However, was assigned the room in the last building facing the construction site. The swimming pool is getting aged, the tiles of the stairs leading into the shallow pool have turned rather sharp, both my daughter and I had scratches on the legs caused by the tiles. Overall a good stay in the resort.

title: Extreme act of customer care
desc: I had lunch in the Kwee Zeen restaurant, the food is great, but I want to highlight is the friendliness and service level of the staff. In particular Mr. Renganathan, who ran after me with my laptop bag which I had left at my table. Thank you so much, without you I would have been in so much trouble.

title: Amazing service
desc: The service was top notch. The servers checked in from time to time to about our satisfaction with the food, which was great. My family and I were serviced by Ms Farah who was friendly and welcoming to us. We thoroughly enjoyed our experience!

title: Sofitel Sentosa - great for the family!
desc: Enjoyable lunch with the family at Kwee Zen. Farah was especially helpful and a great hostess especially with the kids! A relaxing place over the weekend and reservations was convenient. Nice location overlooking the pool and breezy as well.

title: Good experience in sofitel
desc: Nice resort. Swimming pool is good Staff whose name is marcus is friendly and give attention to me to have a nice and comport time. But the toilet and shower booth at th swimming pool is not that kneat and smells bad. Overall i recommend this place

title: Best brunch in town
desc: Best Sunday bunch-! One our our fav Sunday brunches! Sofitel crew are always attentive to all our needs, esp to Farah and her team! Been here all the time. In fact, both my wife and I got married here 15 years ago. Love this place to bits-! Especially with our family of 4 tooooo 10-!

title: Brunch
desc: The brunch was great and amazing. Without noticing Farah and her team serve me a birthday cake and sang for me,the service was top knotch and looking at how farah greeted, chat with every guest and serve them showed how passionate she was in her job. Thank you for suprising me and gave the best service!

title: amazing!!
desc: I recently visited Sofitel Singapore and the service at kweezeen (restaurant) exceeded my expectations ! the service of Darren and Farah were EXTREMELY commendable , they were both friendly and paid attention to us and the food was delicious too! 100% recommend coming!

title: Great experience for family
desc: Great experience overall - my kids enjoyed a lot, pool beach and also the fish spa which we went countless times. Food at the Cliff was also great, and lava cake was amazing! Special thanks to Alson and team for being accommodating with the kids!

title: Breakfast @ kwee zeen
desc: Kwee zeen was great. There was a huge variety of food which i thoroughly enjoy. The service was also excellent. Shout out to Peter, Shahrina and Jesse for their impeccable hospitality! Keep it up guys!

title: Amazing LeBar experience!
desc: Visited the LeBar at Sofitel during the evening to wind down after a long day and was greeted with amazing service from the staff! Shoutout to Kai, Aron and Meimi for making it much more welcoming! Had a special cocktail made by Kai with a refreshing blend of fruits and spirits and it tasted great! Atmosphere was very cozy and aesthetically pleasing! Truly recommended to dine in here.

title: Great place! Wonderful service from staff!
desc: Place was very serene. Room was spacious and nicely decorated. Lots of amenities, enjoyed the 24/7 Fish SPA & the steam bath. The staff at the swimming pool Marcus & Eidil were wonderful we had a great chat, let me know the heritage of the resort and the upcoming 2nd Raffles Hotel which is on going construction ATM. Marcus took the initiative to help me and my family took plenty of group photos from different angles and poses, lastly he surprised us with 3 free printed photos. Fabulous service! Definitely will visit again.

title: Sofitel, one of the best hotels, no matter which city I go.
desc: I been to Sofitel in 3 different countries so far, and their service is absolutely impeccable. I love everything about sofitel. Rooms are nice, comfy and cozy. Stuff is always polite and welcoming. Breakfasts are the best quality with full of choice. Big thanx to Farah who served me at the breakfast and all the other stuff in the kitchen.

title: *Good place for special occasions*
desc: The hotel sent complimentary amenities to our room and deco our bed as well since we were on honeymoon.. A small note from the Director of Front Office and it was a nice touch point. The rooms were clean and cosy. Dinner at the cliff was great. They send a cake over to our table to celebrate our occasions. Overall it was a great experience.

title: Nice restaurant Kwee Zeen
desc: Went with my wife to Kwee Zeen (buffet restaurant at Sofitel Sentosa) for dinner. Nice selection of food including more than one type of fish and chilli crab! Taste is average and the pasta is below average (too hard after frying). Table service is very good, we were very happy with Hang Yong who served us with great attitude and professionalism.

title: 3 nights in Sofitel Sentosa
desc: The environment here is quiet & good! There‚Äôs a shuttle bus between HarbourFront Station and the hotel! It‚Äôs really convenient! And the cliff restaurant is quite good tooo! Especially thanks to Alson!

title: Hotel Experience
desc: The hotel is absolutely stunning, and the staff's level of assistance is truly exceptional. I'd like to extend a special appreciation to Marcus for his outstanding hospitality and for ensuring the seamless execution of our event. We can't wait to return!

title: Fun times and decent food
desc: Friendly staff who make sure your drinks are always full! Chefs also point out which is the best food in their opinion :) Food is good, not amazing, but still nice. Overall, a very enjoyable experience

title: Friendly, and great service!
desc: Great service, very friendly team, always ensuring we have everything we need and putting a smile on our faces. Giving us comfort and convenience to order various drinks and food! Would recommend this hotel for friends, family, basically everyone! Thank you Marcus üëçüèº!!

The food of course is an academy win with fresh lobsters, free flow of champagne and constellation of asian, western, local and BBQ. This is resturant you want to live in once entry. ANTHONY Is another person you must not missed. He anchoes the Bar and sparkles in the service. Cool music swims with a cool guy makes the dinning icy and warm. Not a common day experience. title: Best Staycation Ever!!
desc: We had a 2day/1 night staycay and my girlfriends and I could not have had a better experience. Right from the start before our arrival we received a beautiful note from Sudha telling us she is expecting us. At check in there was a slight error in the room allocation - Sudha instantly rectified this and went above and beyond our expectations by offering an amazing alternative of a villa room. It was my friend‚Äôs farewell after 18yrs living in Singapore so this stay certainly left a huge mark in her final memories of singapore. Thank you Sudha for being part of creating memories for my friends and I. We can‚Äôt wait to return - we are certainly advocates of your hotel. May I also add the amazing service at So spa. Particularly the Manager at the Reception who gave us a lift back to

desc: This hotel is nestled in the forest, a change of scenery guaranteed just a stone's throw from the center The rooms are very nice and very clean A magnificent, well-maintained swimming pool allows you to relax after a day of work Both restaurants offer high quality cuisine During this stay, I particularly appreciate the professionalism and kind welcome of the reception team and especially Anne, Charisma and Sutha but also the concierge team and also Justin At the restaurant Kwee Zeen, I thank Peter, Farah and Robert, very efficient and pleasant Thanks also to Mary and Jess, for the perfect housekeeping At the restaurant The cliff, a special thanks to Emma and the chef for it's very good and innovative meals A very good selection of wine is proposed. Don't hesitate to ask a

title: Kwee Zeen Brunch
desc: The service was excellent,the topping up of the champagne was efficient. All thanks to Farah and Janet. Will recommend this place to my friends . Amazing brunch and staff with nice spread of food.......

title: Beautiful sea view with wonddrful dining experience with great service !
desc: Wide spread for the weekend Buffett with generous servings and quality selection while watching beautiful sunset. Outstanding service from all the service staff together with manager Thomas all take an extra step to cater to all your dining needs. Highly recommended ! üëç

title: Love the place
desc: Love the service, super good. Food is lovely and such wide selection. I especially love the prawns and sashimi. Had a lovely time with my friends. Very generous champagne pouring. Totally recommend All thanks to Farah & Janet

title: Amazing time
desc: Very customer focused resort. Full consideration to all guests. Marcus was very friendly and made sure all were comfortable and our experience with Guna at dinner was exceptional. Very clean and elegant resort

title: A pleasant stay
desc: Had an opportunity to stay over during the F1 weekend. Check in took a bit more time due to the crowd but was well managed. Room was great with standard amenities provided. Breakfast at kwee zeen restaurant was awesome! Attended to by Farah and Janet from the start. Thank you for the warm hospitality! Despite a busy morning, they don't forget to check in on the guests who are seated, myself included.

title: Fantastic experience, amazing staff
desc: We had the most incredible stay here. Came over for the formula 1 and spent an extra 5 nights on Sentosa to extend our holiday and could not possibly have had a better time. The rooms were lovely, restaurants were fantastic and most of all the fabulous and family friendly pool and play area. All of the staff were just so friendly and helpful, especially Marcus and his team poolside who were the most welcoming, attentive, friendly hosts and went out of their way to ensure we had a great stay. The lifeguard Vignesh (sorry if I have spelt that wrong!) was also fantastic, giving us lots of tips of where to go and what to do with our 4 year old. Thanks for having us guys! Thoroughly enjoyed our stay!!

title: Amazing service!
desc: Great location, comfortable beds, gluten free options at all venues. Excellent service by staff, particularly Kamal and Peter and the head chef at The Cliffs who prepared the most delicious gluten free meal. The pool staff are very attentive with towels and drinks. Amazing resort, will definitely come back!!

title: Founder
desc: Sofitel Sentosa was just sensational with some of the best service I ever have experienced in a hotel. Will for sure recommend to stay here when visiting Singapore. Thank you to all staff was truly a stay that will be remembered.

title: Mid term break
desc: The room in Tranquility Wing was quiet enough for rest and a good view of the greenery. The staff from the front desk, room service and at the F&B were warm and friendly. Although a short stay, it was peaceful to unwind. Will come back again. Shout outs to Jia Hong, Kamal, Mimi, Guna and Alson

title: Amazing
desc: Had a great lunch with my family here! Farah, Janet and Sammy were so friendly and incredible with my little niece. They even went out of their ways to comfort the lil one when she cried! Recommend, would come back

title: Wedding at Sofitel
desc: We had an awesome wedding experience in Sofitel Sentosa. The outdoor solemnization venue was amazing with the perfect weather. Jayden has been helpful throughout the planning until the execution. His replies have always been so prompt to ensure everything was smooth. Glad that we chose Sofitel as our wedding venue. The banquet was also awesome with enough portion to the guests. Banquet manager and other personnels during the banquet were also helpful. Thanks Sofitel for thr awesome experience!

title: Best place for people who want to relax
desc: Quite & best place for relax. We were able to do everything within the resort. The restaurants in here offers variety of food in acceptable price range. The staffs in here are very friendly. Especially, I was very impressed with the employee named Marcus. he was very helpful in understanding our needs and resolving our issues. Overall, I am very satisfied with choosing this place as my first accommodation in SG. I would definitely like to visit again.

title: A pleasant stay
desc: Had an opportunity to stay over during the F1 weekend. Check in took a bit more time due to the crowd but was well managed. Room was great with standard amenities provided. Breakfast at kwee zeen restaurant was awesome! Attended to by Farah and Janet from the start. Thank you for the warm hospitality! Despite a busy morning, they don't forget to check in on the guests who are seated, myself included.

title: Place to stay in Sentosa: Luxury resort with 5 star service and amenities
desc: One of (if not) the highlights in our 2 week Singapore family trip transferring from another 5 star Orchard road hotel - celebrating a birthday and kid's first trip overseas (post pandemic) I wanted to organize a memorable experience for them. We booked a suite and were provided with a large Prestige family suite which was perfect for 3/4 persons. The suite itself was beautiful and clean and the 'high tea' setup with treats and stuffed peacock for the children was a lovely touch and we all loved that personalized touch. The hotel also provided children's dressing gowns and slippers, I have not seen this in ANY of my world wide travelers before, a cute touch. Sutha ensured check in was smooth as butter even though we were checking in early before attending Adventure Cove, she

desc: We had a dinner at Sofitel‚Äôs Kwee Zeen restaurant and was assisted by Kamal. Very good food and Kamal‚Äôs service is also good. It‚Äôs my first time trying laksa and it suites my taste. Will definitely try again next time.

title: lucky day for me and Marcus
desc: Thanks to Marcus's warm introduction, provided a good map, and introduced the hotel's services, helped us contact the spa massage service, met him should be considered as Sentosa's know-it-all, lucky day.

title: Good Experience at Kwee Zeen
desc: Overall, an awesome experience with Sofitel Sentosa. We celebrated my son‚Äôs birthday at Kwee Zeen. The food spread is decent and the Indian ones are the best. What makes the dining experience awesome is the service rendered. The staff is attentive and professional. Especially Thomas. Knowing that my son likes peacock, Thomas gave him a peacock soft toy as a gift for his birthday. On top of that, he even offered us a small slice of cake for the celebration. Kudos to the kind thoughts and the great effort! Thankful for the experience, Thomas and team.

title: Sofitel service & standards - 5 stars!
desc: Our recent 2 night escape to Sofitel on Sentosa was simply perfect. From a warm welcome & seamless check in, to the beautiful breakfast, poolside area, gardens, our room & amenities. Special recognition for excellence in service to Marcus our poolside attendant for the special ‚Äòsurprise & delight‚Äô on our first day! It was a memory we are now able to take home physically with us so thank you! With some tropical weather we didn‚Äôt get to spend more time poolside however would recommend the pool and grounds & I‚Äôm sure the spa would also be incredible. Concierge and housekeeping also very friendly and accommodating.

title: Exceptional
desc: We had our Wedding Anniversary celebration with The Cliff! It was a wonderful experience. All crews were exceptionally friendly and especially Rey and Mani mending our table‚Äôs paid great attention and showed initiative in adjusting my daughter to the other seats when she claimed too cold. We were offered a complementary dessert to celebrate our Anniversary too. We had Fremantle Octopus, Scallop Carpaccio, Beef Angus, Cod fish, spaghetti bolognese and cheese sticks. They were all flavourful and on point. Thank you for the amazing evening and making it a memorable one for us.

title: Great experience at The Cliff!
desc: Lovely night with family, warm and cosy ambience, cool weather at the alfresco dining, friendly and attentive staff. Nataliya took care of us very well with her candid recommendations and witty humor.

title: The Cliff‚Äôs best kept secret - Nataliya!
desc: We were blessed by Nataliya‚Äôs warm hospitality and cheery disposition. Armed with impeccable service, and a charming conversationalist, she had us in fits of laughter throughout the night. Thank you for the memorable evening and recommendations!

title: Good setting to celebrate birthdays
desc: Had our birthday dinner at the cliff and it was a great experience. Food was very good and service was excellent. Please commend Nataliya and Vina who made us feel very welcome and came with good suggestions for the meal. The birthday cake was very nice. Thank you for a lovely weekend.

title: Brunch
desc: Enjoyable brunch with nice atmosphere,staff were friendly and buffet spread was big. Farah gave us a warm welcome and attended to our dining needs,she is always smiling and checking on us. She even entertain our kids to make them happy by getting them the balloons. Thank you Farah for the service.

title: Feel the luxury while in surround by nature
desc: Luxury and modern hotel to stay for family, couple even business. Love the professional hospitality from the staffs here especially Ms. Sutha. The hotel smells so good from lobby, to the suite. This place also instagrammable and has its own uniquness. Will recommend to family and friends.

title: Coming back for sure
desc: I recently stayed at the property Sofitel singapore Sentosa with my friends.. We were greeted by the team with warm hospitality and that truly made us feel like a valued guest..The team at the front office did a quick check in and explained all the benefits.. The team prepared a nice touch point and a welcome note in our room...We will definitely come back again for our next vacation. The food at the cliff was amazing with a great view.. Thank you Sofitel Sentosa for making our stay memorable!

title: Best place for Chinese in Singapore
desc: Here the hotel environment is very great, customer service is great, support Chinese, very friendly to Chinese tourists who come to play, especially recommended to come to this hotel for vacation. I lost my wallet in the pool, Marcus and team Ricky helped me find it very quickly, thank you very much!

title: Great experience!
desc: Here to celebrate our anniversary and Sofitel was very attentive to our meals and making sure we were well taken care of. Staff are all very friendly! Will come here again to eat and maybe try a staycation!

title: Excellent service with good recommendation
desc: We had a great dinner and evening at The Cliff, wth excellent service and good recommendations from Nataliya. The recommendations were great choices which catered to our taste. Nataliya was also friendly and warm which enabled us to enjoy this relaxing Monday evening even more.

title: Five star service
desc: Despite the peak period, the check in and check out process was seamless, thanks to Ann, Sutha and Ezzy from front office. They were professional and helpful even when they had to serve guests continuously. Housekeeping was always prompt. Turn down service was neat and water was refilled without request. Overall, a very comfortable stay.

title: Intimate & excellent birthday celebration!
desc: We celebrated my wife's birthday at The Cliff, and we had such an enjoyable time. Jay, Vina & Ray were such great hosts - their service, friendliness and professional recommendations topped off our very important evening. They made conversation with my shy daughter, and it made her feel more comfortable at such a proper setting. The food was excellent, taste and flavours were surprisingly good but not heavy, and it paired well with the wine. The tiramisu...wow. And they surprised my wife with a beautiful cake with candle to top off the evening. Beautiful gesture and definitely memorable! We will definitely be back, and look forward to the excellent food and service! Well done! Truly appreciate your work and standards!

title: Staycation
desc: Room: clean and spacious. Room equipped with iron, iron board, nearest coffee machine, hair dryer and plenty of plug points. Amenities: pool is huge with depth of 2.5 m They do provide life jackets and additional floating devices. Movie room with popcorn. Sand toys provided. Walkway provided to beach. Food: The Sunday brunch was great but it was not part of the package so add on 50$ per pax to enjoy the buffet. The package includes breakfast buffet, 2 course lunch meal and 3 course dinner meal. The choices of meal that wasn't of the meal was very limited and because of that we felt it was really not worth it to go for the full board option. Staff: the staff were so friendly and went above and beyond with their service. Especially the gentleman (forgot his name) who did

title: Amazing experience
desc: Dined at Cliff restaurant for my husband‚Äôs birthday. The service was excellent. Food was amazing. Staff were rather professional and helpful. Natalya served us and her professionalism and service is highly commendable. She made our night a really beautiful night. Such great service from her. Rey and Jay were also equally friendly and professional. Kudos to the whole team. Highly recommend having dinner at the Cliff for the most beautiful and memorable experience

title: Kwee Zeen
desc: We had an amazing dinner at Kwee Zeen served by Kamal, Thomas and Han Yang. The staff were friendly, attentive and courteous. The food was wonderful and we would highly recommend the cucumber salad, spring rolls and Laksa.

title: Wonderful services and location
desc: I would like to express my thanks for the wonderful dining services provided by Marcus and Peter . Their attention to details give us the wow experience and Marcus make an effort to remember to name of our Furkid thank you for making our stay in Sofitel sentosa so wonderful.

title: Great Front offi
desc: Beautiful room, great experience front the time of check-in till check out, very friendly staff at front desk and the whole resort . A welcome note at the room, the detailing was superb look forward to come soon with family for a longer time soon

title: A bali like resort in SG!
desc: A resort here in SG that transports you to a Bali vibes resort! It gives you that peace and tranquility that temporarily makes you forget your worries and enjoy the day!!! Checked in with my spouse to celebrate our 20th wedding anniversary and this was such an excellent choice! Breakfast was fantastic and the service crew were all so energetic and helpful! Definitely will be back soon!!

title: Relaxation at Sofitel Sentosa
desc: Thank you to Marcus & the entire pool team for fulfilling a few special requests for us in order to help ensure we had the most relaxing wonderful holiday! They took incredible care making sure we always had food, a cocktail, or fresh coconut!

title: Amazing experience end to end
desc: We dined at Sofitel for our birthday celebration and we were warmly served by Farah, Ivy and Samy who attended to our every need and were so engaging throughout our whole experience. It made the difference in our dining experience and it made the birthday celebration more personable. Thanks to taking care of us!

title: Best get away and hotel in Singapore
desc: The best get away hotel in SINGAPORE . we stayed for a two day weekend. Had a amazing time in the family suite and experience one of the best Sunday brunch . We came back again the following week . Amazing staff , rooms and facilities.

title: Pizza at The Cliff
desc: Sofitel Sentosa has always been my getaway from bustling Singapore mainland. It's tucked away nicely in lush greenery and that's accentuated by peacock calls and cricket chirps throughout the property. Here at The Cliff today for dinner and was served by the attentive and affable Alson and colleagues. Egg and Bacon pizza was on point and it was washed down well with a glass of house red. Great dinner all thanks to the team at The Cliff!

title: Amazing hotel !!
desc: I came here for few days. Atmosphere is so relaxing!!! Calming myself. I enjoyed a lot at restaurant Cliff. And Aron at the bar treated us very well!! We had beautiful dishes from Paolo!!!Beautiful drink and food. Amazing!!!!! Thank you so much !

title: Sentosa Treasure
desc: The quality and beauty of this place is matched only by the friendliness of the staff. Most notable were Michelle checking us in and Farah who made breakfast an absolute pleasure. Highly recommended.

title: good experience
desc: Here the environment is very good, the attitude of the waiters are very good, waiting for the car when they will help to take the initiative to tease the children, people are very good ah, Marcus take the initiative to ask me how I feel about the hotel, they are great, go out of the city is very convenient, the hotel's car is very convenient, do not have to wait too long!

title: Delighted with Sofitel Sentosa
desc: Beautiful property . Ambience,location ,services ,cleaniness all fanatastic . Impeccable experience staying here . The teams are polite and helpful. Delighted with all staff specially housekeeping team.

title: Fabulous place with excellent service.
desc: Lovely resort, nice pool and gardens, food was excellent. Shuttle bus to shopping centre. Kai, Arun and Jessy at the bar were fantastic. The service is outstanding. Was impressed with gardens. The gym was large and well equipped.

title: Poolside chill
desc: We had a wonderful time at the pool. Place was spacious and clean and bar food was wonderful too. Even the birds and peacocks loved it! Kudos to Marcus, lifeguard Vikness, Eidil who keep an at attentive and entertaining eye throughout.

title: Great drinks! Great service!

title: Anniversary at The Cliff
desc: We were celebrating our 23 anniversary on that night and was served by Rey and Alson Li. Recommendation of wine and Italy beer was superb and the food is so good. I asked about the pizza The Meat Lover and immediately Rey told me is a very good choice. Alson was nice enough to clear our table even before we asked as we wanted to take picture for our kids to see. He quickly volunteered to take for us. All without asking and waiting. I love it and for sure will come back again.

title: Breakfast at Kwee Zeen
desc: We had a wonderful breakfast experience at the Kwee Zeen @ Sofitel Singapore Sentosa Resort & Spa. Every staff member we encountered, from the valet to the breakfast check- in staff they are all very delightful and cheerful. The breakfast spread was excellent and the choices are great and not forgetting Ms Farah and her team has shown great customer service by constantly checking everything is in order, ensuring used plates & bowls are clear. The most surprising thing is that while we will away and back to our table, we will super surprise our drinks and cutlery are covered with a foldable food cover mesh and that's was something you can't have it elsewhere. Will surely recommend Kwee Zeen. to my colleagues friends and family. Keep up the excellent service Farah & Team.

title: Experience of a lifetime!
desc: My husband and I booked Sofitel for a quick relaxing trip (new baby...two other boys...) and we had the best time ever. The staff were absolutely amazing - we received a complimentary upgrade to a suite with complimentary amenities as well. It made our trip so special! The suite was spacious and luxurious. The staff have been amazing - attentive and helpful and have looked after us well. We booked a night away to relax and we are leaving absolutely relaxed beyond expectation!

title: SOFITEL SENTOSA
desc: The Manager of Front Office is very accomodating and very good. Very approachable team and nice. They provided their assistance very well. The room and the facilities are very clean and neat. All officers are very professional. It is actually my first time to be here in SG. Mr. Kamal (from Kwee Zeen) and Mr. Marcus (Pool side Aperol corner side) are so accommodating. They always check on us regarding our needs. They are very friendly professionals that I have met so far here in Singapore.

title: Great high tea experience
desc: Had a wonderful high tea at LeBar at Sofitel sentosa. Has a very nice alfresco ambience that overlooks a fountain. Well spaced out seating so there's pretty good privacy as well. The high tea set today was the peranakan set and most of the items are really good, especially the wagyu beef tartlet and the otah and hae bee hiam sandwich. Service by Kai was excellent too. Recommend to come if you want a nice, chill and quiet afternoon.

title: Very good hotel, excellent service, Hospitable staff specially to their house keeping!
desc: Good room service, we are celebrating our anniversary, special mentine to anne, she made a Happy Anniversary note to our room, very hospitable and our room is always clean and nice. Excellent service , very nice hotel and very hospitable staff

title: Great experience at The Cliff
desc: Great food and great service. Our server Alson and Paul, went above and beyond to ensure we were taken care of. Our family had a great time! Food came quickly, servers were friendly and we had a great meal.

title: Brilliant
desc: Beautiful location, and great to recharge. Marcus on poolside was brilliant; exceptional service all round. Really enjoyed the live piano and the peacocks running around. The food is delicious and very generous portions too. Close to the beach and a perfect break from the city.

title: Great experience at The Cliff
desc: Food was great and the service, even better! The service staff was attentive and warm. They also provided a delicious chocolate cake, complete with a candle, for the celebration of a birthday. The pizzas were wonderful and I was surprised at the generous serving size of the kids' meal.

title: Excellent service and food
desc: Outstanding service by our server Nataliya. She was extremely knowledgeable about the menu and her recommendations were spot on. This is our third time here and the food just keeps getting better. The portions are just right, the food came out very quickly and extremely efficient service. Highly recommend coming here. We will definitely be back!

title: Relax resort with friendly staffs
desc: Relax resort with good service. Room is little dated but acceptable. Ezzah (Ezzy) is very friendly and attentive, Syed is very helpful. Service at The Cliff restaurant is good too. More activities can be added to the pool area. 132 steps down to beach area. Overall we had fun and will definitely come back with our dog!

title: Exceptional staff make for a relaxing stay
desc: We have just had the most amazing five days at this resort - especially thanks to Anne H (Guest Relations Manager). Our stay has been unforgettable within the relaxing environment around the resort and spa and a well equiped gym. The main difference at the resort is the staff. Nothing was to much trouble, they remembered our name, room number, favourite table and drinks etc and it was always with a smile. The service was faultless and we will definitely be return as soon as possible.

title: Great experience!
desc: This is my first time staying at Sofitel Sentosa and it has been a great experience! From the check in we were assisted well by the staff. The rooms are quite luxurious as well. We liked the food at kwee zeen a lot.

title: Incredible service!
desc: We were immediately upgraded to a lovely suite upon arrival where ‚Äúhappy anniversary‚Äù flowers chocolate cake & fruit were waiting for us. All of the staff at checkin, Le Bar, the Cliff restaurant & especially at Kwee Zeen went above & beyond.
